Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Irving Park to Fullerton
ShortDescription: SB 9 Ashland rr via Ashland, Lawrence, Marine Dr, In Lake Shore, Sheridan, Cannon, Fullerton, O Lake Shore & norm rt due to blockage from Irving Pk to Fullerton

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Lawrence, Marine Drive, Inner Lake Shore Drive, Sheridan, Cannon, Fullerton, Outer Lake Shore Drive, then resume their normal route due to street blockage between Irving Park and Fullerton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with delays due to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
